title: Comodo Hackathon - 1st Place
description: There were 16 teams. We built Wower and I was responsible for its backend API and desktop application.

title: COMPEC Garaj Hackathon - 1st Place
description: There were nearly 10 teams. We built a simple game to give people some knowledge about online information security.

title: Büyük Sıçrama IOT Hackathon - 1st Place
description: There were more than 20 teams. We built WowDoor and I was responsible for its backend API (serverless architecture with Microsoft Azure).

title: Boğaziçi TechSummit Hackathon - 2nd Place
description: There were nearly 10 teams. I've built a mail classifier that uses machine learning (Naive Bayes) by myself.

title: UNFPA Innovation Day Project - 2nd Place
description: We made a project to help spread the ideas of UNFPA.
